definition: not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
predictable/sth one can predict without being a clairvoyant
hanging in the balance/the future is hard to forecast/¿Qué serà?/who knows what the future holds?

sentences.english: But Kinney says discussing the dog’s future (or lack thereof) was still unsettling.
sentences.chinese: 但金妮说讨论这只狗的未来去向，仍是前途未卜。

sentences.english: The future of our planet is at stake.
sentences.chinese: 我们这颗行星的未来生死未卜。

sentences.english: Net TV is still more of a gamble.
sentences.chinese: 而互联网电视则仍看起来更像是一种前途未卜的赌注。

sentences.english: The patient is out of danger now, but it was touch and go for a while.
sentences.chinese: 病人现在已经脱离危险，但曾有一段时间吉凶未卜。

sentences.english: The life of the wounded pilot is at stake.
sentences.chinese: 受伤的飞行员生死未卜。

sentences.english: But we wouldn't have known that.
NEARLY seven years after the toppling of the Taliban, Afghanistan’s future is still up for grabs.
sentences.chinese: 推翻塔利班已近七年了，可阿富汗依旧前途未卜。

sentences.english: Lane width test, the original 31 group of officers and soldiers heart floating.
sentences.chinese: 车道宽生死未卜，原31团的官兵人心浮动。

sentences.english: How were we supposed to know?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎么可能未卜先知？

sentences.english: No chance of that as President Obama's jobs bill now seems DOA legislatively.
sentences.chinese: 想也是白想，奥巴马的就业议案现在还生死未卜呢。

sentences.english: The fate of the bill hung in balance.
Emergency crews have rescued 29 miners who spent more than 30 hours not knowing whether they were gonna lived.
sentences.chinese: 紧急救援人员已经救出29名生死未卜的被困矿工。

sentences.english: Time is life and death is uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 一时间中村功生死未卜。

sentences.english: Oslash; Optimus Prime and Megatron are caught in the destruction of an experimental Space Bridge and presumed dead.
sentences.chinese: 擎天柱与威震天于太空桥爆炸中一同失踪，生死未卜。

sentences.english: Optimus Prime and Megatron are caught in the destruction of an experimental Space Bridge and presumed dead.
sentences.chinese: 擎天柱与威震天于太空桥爆炸中一同失踪，生死未卜。

definition: hanging in the balance/the future is hard to forecast/¿Qué serà?/who knows what the future holds?
not knowing what to do next/at a loose end
what course to follow/what path to take
